field_body.value:
As environmentally conscious citizens, we highly recommend using public transportation to get to NYC and to the venue. Also, nearby parking is scarce and extremely expensive (~$150/day)!

Your favorite mapping or public transit app likely includes good support for New York City, but we suggest that you take a look at the Citymapper website and mobile apps, which also support ride sharing, bike sharing, ferry, train, and walking directions.
